name: Uglier, Louder, Taller, Weirder â€“ Hearing the Weeds grow
description: Group exhibition and screening program featuring Crystal Z Campbell, Ellinor Aurora Aasgaard & Zayne Armstrong, John Smith, Laura Nitsch, and Marta Popivoda. A screening and video art program that explores underrepresented voices and experimental moving image practices, offering a space for non-normative narratives.
